content: Hi, I want to create what I call ‘101 messaging’ which would just be videos of 30-60 sec bullet points explaining policies .. just basic simple talk on kitchen table and social issues 1) does trickle down economics work? 2) why trump tariffs are inflation 2.0 - simple messaging which really is ‘101’ basic - and then have the short clips blasted throughout insta, messaging etc (after they are approved). Is there a way we can accomplish this please? I recall back in 2012 Obama had an interesting YouTube video explaining why trickle down doesn’t work which was really good and catchy

Hi Matt! The "unofficial" team doing stuff like this, video and graphics, is Content Brigade. They are on a different server. You can apply to be on that team here: https://events.democrats.org/event/637836/
